title: Mexican Heritage Villahermosa Hideaway Moments from La Choca Park
description: Experience the buzz of the vibrant capital of Tabasco when you stay at Quinta Edén Villahermosa, a grand hotel that echoes the elegance of Mexico's southeast during the 19th century. Expect swaying palm trees and paved courtyards, beautiful gardens and alfresco lounging areas. Incredible facilities include a swimming pool, fitness centre and the Perse restaurant, where you'll enjoy contemporary Mexican haute cuisine. Villahermosa's sights are just a hop and a skip away: La Choca Park is an easy 15-minute stroll from the hotel, the fascinating sculpture trail of Parque-Museo La Venta is just a 10-minute drive away, and the city centre with cinema, shops and restaurants is only seven minutes away by car.
offer_address: Av Paseo Usumacinta 1402, Villahermosa, Tabasco, Mexico
